text: The 1935 New York Giants season was the franchise's 53rd season. The team finished in third place in the National League with a 91-62 record, 8½ games behind the Chicago Cubs. ==Offseason== * November 1, 1934: Johnny Vergez, Pretzel Pezzullo, Blondy Ryan, George Watkins and cash were traded by the Giants to the Philadelphia Phillies for Dick Bartell.Johnny Vergez page at Baseball Reference * December 12, 1934: Jack Salveson was traded by the Giants to the Pittsburgh Pirates for Leon Chagnon.Leon Chagnon page at Baseball Reference == Regular season == === Season standings === === Record vs. opponents === === Notable transactions === * June 22, 1935: Jimmy Ripple was purchased by the Giants from the Montreal Royals.Jimmy Ripple page at Baseball Reference === Roster === {| class="toccolours" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !
